title: Navigation doesn't work after update to Android 10 on Pixel 3XL
content:
My pixel 3xl updated to Android 10 last night.  Since that time, I have not been able to
Use Gestures
Access the camera by double-tapping the power button
Go directly back to the home screen without hitting the back button repeatedly
Use the long-press on wi-fi to access a full list of available networks
List all the running programs
Receive notifications

I have tried restarting, shutting off the phone and waiting 10 min to restart it.  Are there any other suggestions to resolve this? 

Thanks,
daveBr
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
